[++iSharingan's v1.6 codes++]

[Owned Items x999 (v1.6)]
D3000000 085667BA
C0000000 0000006A
80000000 00000000
10000000 000003E7
D0000000 00000000
DC000000 00000002
D2000000 00000000
{Only affects items you currently have at least 1 of.}

D3000000 085667BA
C0000000 0000006A
10000000 000003E7
DC000000 00000002
D2000000 00000000
{Ignores whether you already owned the item or not.\n\n'???' items will not display their name until picked up legit at least once.}

[All Characters Max Level (v1.6)]
D3000000 085BEB20

D0000000 00000000
DC000000 00000080
D1000000 00000000
D2000000 00000000
{Kill any enemy with a character to instantly level up to 255.\n\nThe cost of leveling up in the Bazaar behaves oddly with this code on, but doesn't break anything}

[++Fairy Rental Skill Codes++]

[Copy Equipped Skill to 2nd Slot (All Fairies)]
D3000000 08566980
C0000000 0000000C
90000000 FF000001
DB000000 0000003F
D8000000 00000094
DC000000 FFFFFFFF
DD000000 00000420
DB000000 00000094
D8000000 00000095
DC000000 FFFFFFFF
D0000000 00000000
DD000000 00000820
20000095 000000FF
D0000000 00000000
D0000000 00000000
DC000000 00000098
D1000000 00000000
{X+Left to copy\n\nY+Left to reset\n\nEffects of this code are persistant\n\nThis code can be turned off when not updating/resetting the coppied skill}

D1000000 00000000
{X+Down to copy\n\nY+Down to reset\n\nEffects of this code are persistant\n\nThis code can be turned off when not updating/resetting the coppied skill}

D1000000 00000000
{The above codes copy to persistant memory that will remain after closing the software if you save\n\nSimply re-activate this code to re-apply coppied skills set up previously}

[++Weapon Data (v1.6)++]

[Unlock All Weapon Skills]
D3000000 085CAD10
C0000000 00000406
A0000010 0000FFFF
E0000000 00000010
00000000 00000000
00000000 00000000
D0000000 00000000
DC000000 00000054
D1000000 00000000
{Master Sword skills and Legendary skill will require extra conditions, but will have 0 remaining kills required\n\nEffects are not immediately visible upon obtaining a new weapon}

D3000000 085CAD10
C0000000 00000406
A0000010 0000FFFF
A0000010 0000003C
10000014 00000005
D0000000 00000000
D0000000 00000000
DC000000 00000054
D1000000 00000000
{Except Master Sword\n\nEffects are not immediately visible upon obtaining a new weapon}

[Add Legendary Skill To All Weapons]
D3000000 085CAD10
C0000000 00000406
A0000010 0000FFFF

DB000000 0000001E

DC000000 FFFFFFFF
20000016 0000002A
D0000000 00000000
D0000000 00000000
D0000000 00000000
DC000000 00000054
D1000000 00000000
{Except Master Sword\n\nAdding Legendary will replace the weapon's first skill\n\nIgnores weapons that already have the skill\n\nEffects are not immediately visible upon obtaining a new weapon}
